LogoutButton.confirmHeading: Are you sure you want to sign out of Basis Theory?
LogoutButton.confirmCaption: You can sign in again anytime.

YourPlanCaption.limited: When a token has been Created, Read, Decrypted or used with one of our services (eg. Proxy or Reactor) it will become a Monthly Active Token for the current monthly billing cycle. Subsequent interactions with an active token do not count against the included active token limit.
YourPlanCaption.limitExceeded: You have exceeded the included Monthly Active Tokens for this plan by {{limitExceededBy}} tokens. Add billing information to avoid an interruption in service.
YourPlanCaption.unlimited: Once you've used all of your included Monthly Active Tokens, you'll be charged for each additional active token in the monthly billing cycle. To understand your pricing, view your plan.

CreateApplication.title: Create Application
CreateApplication.applicationTypeCaption: To learn more about application types, <1>click here</1>.
CreateApplication.selectPermissionsCaption: To learn more about permissions, <1>click here</1>.

ApplicationPermissionsEmptyState.caption: Choose an application type
ApplicationPermissionsEmptyState.helper: Applications can serve multiple purposes.<1/> To learn more about each type of application, check out <2>our documentation</2>.

ApplicationKeyModal.title: API Key Generated
ApplicationKeyModal.alertDescription: Don't forget to save your API key somewhere safe. If you lose it, you can't recover it. You'll have to regenerate the API key.
ApplicationKeyModal.agreement: I understand that this is the only place I can access the <1>API Key</1>.<2/>If I don't copy and store it now, <3>I won't be able to do it again</3>.

ApplicationDetail.regenerateDescription: If you forgot or lost you this API Key, you can regenerate it. <1/> All authorized apps must be updated with the new API Key.
ApplicationDetail.deleteDescription: After deleting, tokens that use this application will stop working.
ApplicationDetail.regenerateModalMessage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the <1>API Key</1> for <2>{{appName}}</2>?
ApplicationDetail.regenerateModalCaption: You won't be able to recover it after this action.
ApplicationDetail.regenerateConfirmCaption: Type the application name to confirm.
ApplicationDetail.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{appName}}</1>?
ApplicationDetail.deleteModalCaption: You won't be able to recover it after this action.
ApplicationDetail.deleteConfirmCaption: Type the application name to confirm.

ApplicationDangerZone.regenerateDescription: If you forgot or lost you this API Key, you can regenerate it. <1/> All authorized apps must be updated with the new API Key.
ApplicationDangerZone.deleteDescription: After deleting, tokens that use this application will stop working.
ApplicationDangerZone.regenerateModalMessage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the <1>API Key</1> for <2>{{appName}}</2>?
ApplicationDangerZone.regenerateModalCaption: You won't be able to recover it after this action.
ApplicationDangerZone.regenerateConfirmCaption: Type the application name to confirm.

ApplicationDeleteModal.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{appName}}</1>?
ApplicationDeleteModal.deleteModalCaption: You won't be able to recover it after this action.
ApplicationDeleteModal.deleteConfirmCaption: Type the application name to confirm.

CreateTenantModal.title: Create new Tenant
CreateTenantModal.tenantNameHelper: You can change the Tenant name later

CreateFirstTenant.title: Welcome to Basis Theory
CreateFirstTenant.intro: Everything starts with a Tenant. Tenants store configuration and tokens - typically Tenants are used for test vs production environments. Find out more about Tenants
CreateFirstTenant.getStarted: To get started, let's create your first Tenant.
CreateFirstTenant.tenantNameHelperText: You'll be able to change this name or create additional tenants later.

helperTexts.nominal: Type the email where you want to send the invite.
helperTexts.403: Please verify your email before inviting a member. For further assistance, visit <1>{{ supportSite }}</1>.

DeleteTenantInvitationModal.title: Delete Invitation
DeleteTenantInvitationModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the invitation to <1>{{ invitationEmail }}</1>?

Snackbar.tenantInvitationResendSuccess: A new invitation has been sent to <1>{{ invitationEmail }}<1>.

EmptyReactors.heading: You don't have any Reactors yet.
EmptyReactors.caption: Start enriching your Tokens by creating a new Reactor.

info.title: What is a Reactor?
info.content: Reactors enable the secure processing of sensitive token data with 3rd parties.

info.title: How do I create a new Reactor?
info.content: Configure a Reactor here on the Portal or with <1>our API</1>. See <2>our guide</2> for more details.

info.title: How to use a Reactor?
info.content: Using <1>our API</1>, you are enabled to securely react with any Token.

ReactorFormulaDetailContent.configurationCaption: The following properties will be required to configure this reactor.
ReactorFormulaDetailContent.codePreviewCaption: To better understand the reactor formula, explore the code used to enrich your token.

ReactorFormulaPrivateBetaContent.caption1: Use our open framework for interacting with the world's most sensitive data. We make it easy to use the same logic you have already built to exchange your tokenized data with a 3rd party.
ReactorFormulaPrivateBetaContent.caption2: This specific formula is currently in private beta. Reach out to use this and other formulas with limited availability.

ReactorDetails.nameHelperText: Easily identify your reactor with a descriptive name.

ReactorDangerZone.deleteDescription: After deleting, tokens that use this application will stop working.
ReactorDangerZone.deleteModalFieldHelperText: Type the token reactor name to confirm
ReactorDangerZone.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{ reactorName }}</1>?
ReactorDangerZone.deleteModalMessageCaption: You won't be able to recover it after this action.

RequestParameters.title: Request Parameters
RequestParameters.description: These properties are required each time you create a reaction. Include these properties within the POST body of your request. Learn more about it in <1>our documentation</1>.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteTitle: Delete this Tenant and remove all tokens and applications
dangerZone.deleteDescription: This action is permanent. You will not be able retrieve any associated data created in this Tenant; this includes tokens, applications, etc.

deleteModal.title: Delete Tenant
deleteModal.messageTitle: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{tenantName}}</1> tenant?
deleteModal.message: <0>You will not be able to recover this tenant after deleting it.</0><1>You are deleting all associated data within this Tenant.</1>
deleteModal.confirmCaption: Type the tenant name below to confirm deletion.

allPlans.title: All Plans
allPlans.caption: Find the best plan for you

developerPlan.footnoteHeading: What is a Monthly Active Token (MAT)?
developerPlan.footnoteContent: When a token has been Created, Read, Decrypted or used with one of our services (eg. Proxy or Reactor) it will become a Monthly Active Token for the current monthly billing cycle. Subsequent interactions with an active token do not count against the included active token limit.

customPlans.description: Reach out to talk about discount volume pricing.

Billing.title: Billing
Billing.caption:
Don't want to be limited to {{ includedMonthlyActiveTokens }} Monthly Active Tokens?
Add a Payment Method to increase your limit.
Billing.paymentCaption: {{ brand }} credit card ending in {{ lastDigits }}

PaymentInformationModal.title: Payment Method

invalid.expirationDate: Your card's expiration date is invalid
invalid.cvc: Your card's security code is invalid

incomplete.expirationDate: Your card's expiration date is incomplete
incomplete.cvc: Your card's security code is incomplete

PaymentInformationModal.cardSubmitErrorMessage: Adding your Payment Method has failed. Try again with another card.

EmptyLogs.heading: No Audit Logs found
EmptyLogs.caption:
Your plan only allows you to view Audit Logs for the last {{ duration }}.
If you’re looking for logs older than this — <1>get in touch.

empty.heading: No results matching your query...
empty.caption: Your plan only allows you to view Audit Logs for the last <1>duration</1>. If you're looking for logs older than this - <2>get in touch</2>.
